description.ko: FLORA-9은 유기적 생명체와 디지털 구조 사이의 경계를 탐구합니다. 이 작품은 자연이 생물학적 형태와 수정 같은 데이터의 첨단 합성체로 진화하여, 내부의 빛과 사이버네틱 에너지로 진동하는 세상을 묘사합니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 explores the boundary between organic life and digital constructs. It depicts a world where nature has evolved into a high-tech synthesis of biological forms and crystalline data, vibrating with internal light and cybernetic energy.

prompt: A hyper-realistic macro shot of FLORA-9, a futuristic cybernetic flower. The petals are made of translucent frosted glass with embedded glowing fiber-optic veins that pulse with neon cyan and magenta light. The center of the flower features a floating geometric core of crystalline data shards. The stem is constructed from sleek matte-black titanium with visible micro-circuitry. The background is a dark, ethereal void filled with floating digital dust particles and soft bokeh, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, unreal engine 5 render style.
